{"step_by_step_thinking": "The EQ-5D is a health-related quality of life assessment tool. According to Document [0], it assesses health status in terms of five dimensions of health. However, it does not specify that it is a 5-question assessment. Document [2] provides more detail, stating that the EQ-5D descriptive system is a preference-based HRQL measure with one question for each of the five dimensions. Therefore, it can be inferred that the EQ-5D is indeed a 5-question assessment.", "answer_choice": "A"}
